Body:
I have an device which is connected to the WiFi using an android device. But i am not sure how to reconnect this device when the device gets disconnected.

So the use cases i am looking at is:

  1. How to store WiFi credentials in my device such that it auto-connects ?
  2. Also how to store multiple WiFi credentials so i can store WiFi and move my device across to different places?
Which OS are you using? Android or Windows? Both should store WiFi passwords and use them if possible.... so where is the problem?
The device i am talking about is a headless device which runs on linux OS. Can you share moire details how to achieve this? Thanks a ton Nico
